tweet: Regarding  https://t.co/XVa3zU9m09:  I offer 1 BTC bounty for the best blogpost exposing the mods (with their real names) of /r/CryptoCurrency subreddit who censor posts about #IOTA and other #cryptocurrencies. Publish the link as a reply, please, I'll choose the winner in 7 days.
